statements.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM HM_ABNORMCHK WHERE 1=1
OBSDT = #OBSDT#
DAMCD = #DAMCD#
DATATP = #DATATP#
OBSDT BETWEEN #STARTDT# AND #ENDDT#

SELECT OBSDT, DAMCD, DATATP, EMPNO, CHKYN, CHKOBSDT, NOTE, DAMNM, EMPNM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM, A.OBSDT, A.DAMCD, A.DATATP, A.EMPNO, A.CHKYN, A.CHKOBSDT, A.NOTE, B.DAMNM, C.KORNAME EMPNM FROM HM_ABNORMCHK A, DUBDAMSPC@TECH.WORLD B, DTB_USERINFO C WHERE 1=1 AND A.DAMCD = B.DAMCD AND TRIM(A.EMPNO) = TRIM(C.EMPNO)
A.OBSDT = #OBSDT#
A.DAMCD = #DAMCD#
A.DATATP = #DATATP#
A.OBSDT BETWEEN #STARTDT# AND #ENDDT#
AND TRIM(A.EMPNO) LIKE '%' || #TXT# || '%'
AND C.KORNAME LIKE '%' || #TXT# || '%'
ORDER BY
A.OBSDT DESC
$SORTPROPERTY$ $SORTDIRECTION$
) WHERE 1=1
ROW_NUM BETWEEN $START$ AND $START$ + $LIMIT$

SELECT OBSDT, DAMCD, DATATP, EMPNO, CHKYN, CHKOBSDT, NOTE, DAMNM, EMPNM, ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT A.OBSDT, A.DAMCD, A.DATATP, A.EMPNO, A.CHKYN, A.CHKOBSDT, A.NOTE, A.DAMNM, A.EMPNM, A.ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT DT.OBSDT, DT.DAMCD, DT.DAMNM, DT.DATATP, ABN.EMPNO, ABN.CHKYN, ABN.CHKOBSDT, ABN.NOTE, ABN.EMPNM, DT.ROW_NUM FROM ( SELECT A.OBSDT, A.DAMCD, A.DATATP, A.EMPNO, A.CHKYN, A.CHKOBSDT, A.NOTE, B.KORNAME EMPNM FROM HM_ABNORMCHK A, DTB_USERINFO B WHERE 1=1 AND TRIM(A.EMPNO) = TRIM(B.EMPNO)
A.OBSDT = #OBSDT#
A.DAMCD=#DAMCD#
A.DATATP = #DATATP#
AND TRIM(A.EMPNO) LIKE '%' || #TXT# || '%'
AND B.KORNAME LIKE '%' || #TXT# || '%'
) ABN, ( SELECT DAM.DAMCD, DAM.DAMNM, TT.OBSDT, TP.DATATP , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TT.OBSDT, DAM.DAMCD, TP.DATATP ORDER BY DAM.DAMNM, TT.OBSDT DESC, TP.DATATP ) ROW_NUM FROM (
SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FN_CONV_HH24(#STARTDT#), 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') + (LEVEL - 1)), 'YYYYMMDD') OBSDT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= ((TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FN_CONV_HH24(#ENDDT#), 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FN_CONV_HH24(#STARTDT#), 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD')) + 1)
) TT, VM_DAMCODE DAM, ( SELECT 'D' DATATP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'W' DATATP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'R' DATATP FROM DUAL ) TP WHERE 1=1
DAM.DAMTYPE=#DAMTYPE#
DAM.DAMCD=#DAMCD#
TP.DATATP = #DATATP#
) DT WHERE DT.DAMCD = ABN.DAMCD(+) AND DT.OBSDT = ABN.OBSDT(+) AND DT.DATATP = ABN.DATATP(+) ) A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY
A.OBSDT DESC, A.DAMNM, A.DATATP
$SORTPROPERTY$ $SORTDIRECTION$
) WHERE 1=1
ROW_NUM BETWEEN $START$ AND $START$ + $LIMIT$
statements.update: UPDATE HM_ABNORMCHK SET OBSDT = #OBSDT#, DAMCD = #DAMCD#, DATATP = #DATATP#, EMPNO = #EMPNO#, CHKYN = #CHKYN#, CHKOBSDT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI'), NOTE = #NOTE# WHERE OBSDT = #OBSDT# AND DAMCD = #DAMCD# AND DATATP = #DATATP#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM HM_ABNORMCHK WHERE OBSDT = #OBSDT# AND DAMCD = #DAMCD# AND DATATP = #DATATP#
